CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.SP_NO_BACKUP: The selected Service Profile "{{serviceProfile}}" does not permit Backup Services
CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.SP_DEFINED: Backup settings are as defined in the selected profile "{{serviceProfile}}"
CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.BACKUP_INFO: Select offsite backup to enable saving the protected VMs offsite for up to one year.
CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.ERROR_REP: Backup cannot be set to ON without specifying a repository to use
CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.ERROR_INTERVAL: Retry interval in minutes is mandatory
CREATE_VPG_BACKUP.REPOSITORY_NOT_DEFINED: A repository has not been defined in the recovery site. You cannot enable offsite backup without first defining a repository.
